programme.title: Cemetery of Splendour
programme.desc: A group of soldiers in a small town on the Mekong River in northern Thailand are struck with a bizarre sleeping illness. Fantasy drama, starring Jenjira Pongpas, Banlop Lomnoi and Jarinpattra Rueangram. In Thai

programme.title: Let Her Out
programme.desc: Premiere. A young woman recovering from an accident finds herself plagued by traumatic visions, hallucinations and blackouts. Horror, starring Alanna LeVierge, Nina Kiri and Adam Christie

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited sci-fi sequel, which sees Harrison Ford returning as Deckard alongside Ryan Gosling and Jared Leto

programme.title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk
programme.desc: Premiere. A 19-year-old private is brought home for a victory tour after a harrowing Iraq battle, as flashbacks show what really happened to his squad - contrasting the realities of war with America's perceptions. Drama, starring Joe Alwyn, Garrett Hedlund and Arturo Castro

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: Premiere. A theatre-owning koala sets up a singing competition in a last-ditch bid to stay afloat. Animation, with the voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane and Scarlett Johansson

programme.desc: Premiere. A friendly cheese race becomes a high-stakes dash to the finish after magpie Louis risks his friend's workshop with a secret bet. Animation, with the voices of John F Brungot, Anders Bye and Frimand Plosen

programme.title: Live by Night
programme.desc: Premiere. A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan. Crime drama, directed by and starring Ben Affleck, with Elle Fanning, Remo Girone and Brendan Gleeson

programme.desc: Premiere. A protective dad is far from thrilled when his daughter begins dating a foul-mouthed playboy millionaire. Comedy, starring Bryan Cranston, James Franco and Zoey Deutch

programme.title: My Father Die
programme.desc: Premiere. A deaf mute waits almost two decades to get his hands on his abusive father. Action drama, starring Joe Anderson, John Schneider and Kevin Gage

programme.title: One Last Score
programme.desc: Premiere. A young, recently-released and unpredictable ex-con with bad luck, and a listless girl-next-door with a troubled family, become trapped in a downward spiral of crime and obsessive love, as they try to ditch their dead-end town for a better life. Crime drama, starring Riley Keough, Chris Zylka and Faith Hill

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Shadowlands
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the later life of novelist CS Lewis, detailing how he fell in love with American poet Joy Gresham, only to see his new-found happiness marred by tragedy and illness. Directed by Richard Attenborough and starring Anthony Hopkins, Debra Winger, Edward Hardwicke, John Wood, Michael Denison and Joseph Mazzello

programme.title: The Veil
programme.desc: The lone survivor of a religious cult that committed mass suicide agrees to return to the site of the tragedy with a documentary crew. They uncover evidence that the leader of the sect was conducting experiments to find the secret of eternal life, but their presence disturbs the supernatural forces he conjured up. Horror, starring Jessica Alba and Lily Rabe

programme.title: Winter
programme.desc: A father consumed by grief must come to terms with an emotional breakdown in order to save his relationship with his two young sons. Drama, starring Tommy Flanagan, Edward Ashley and David Broughton-Davies

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a future dominated by the deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: The reported death of a pilot during the Second World War leaves his girlfriend seeking solace in the arms of his one-time best friend - until the supposedly dead airman turns up. However, when the Japanese launch a bombing raid on a US base in Hawaii, the three of them have to put aside their personal problems. Romantic drama, starring Ben Affleck, Josh Hartnett, Kate Beckinsale and Cuba Gooding Jr

programme.title: Queen Of Katwe
programme.desc: The life of a poor Ugandan youngster is changed forever when she is introduced to the game of chess. Drama, starring David Oyelowo, Lupita Nyong'o and Madina Nalwanga

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a future dominated by the deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Twentysomething gun runners David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli win a $300million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan. Fact based comedy-drama, starring Miles Teller, Jonah Hill and Bradley Cooper

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: The bandana-wearing one-man army has turned his back on violence to live a quiet life in Thailand. But before long he takes up arms once again to rescue a party of missionaries who have been taken captive en route to Burma by a sadistic military officer. Action sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Julie Benz and Graham McTavish

programme.title: Adult Beginners
programme.desc: An entrepreneur on the brink of success instead loses everything when the product he launches is a failure, prompting his friends to turn their backs on him. He retreats to the safety of his sister's home, where he is allowed to stay on the condition he helps look after her three-year-old son. Despite his haphazard attitude to childcare, he forms a close relationship with his nephew. Comedy drama, starring Nick Kroll, Rose Byrne and Bobby Cannavale

programme.title: Queen Of Katwe
programme.desc: The life of a poor Ugandan youngster is changed forever when she is introduced to the game of chess. Drama, starring David Oyelowo, Lupita Nyong'o and Madina Nalwanga

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: A 12-year-old orphan is abducted and taken away to a magical land by a band of pirates, who need child labour to mine a magical substance created by fairies. He escapes, joining forces with a roguish adventurer, and goes in search of the truth about his mother and his own destiny. Fantasy adventure prequel to Peter Pan, starring Levi Miller, Hugh Jackman, Garrett Hedlund and Rooney Mara

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the Da Vinci Code expert suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: Conflict erupts between the defenders of a kingdom and an invading horde that has travelled from a dying world. Fantasy adventure based on the best-selling computer game, starring Travis Fimmel, Paula Patton and Ben Foster

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick

programme.title: The Back-up Plan
programme.desc: A thirtysomething single woman fears she may never have children and decides to undergo artificial insemination. However, shortly after leaving the clinic, she meets the man of her dreams but must decide how to break the news she may shortly be pregnant. Romantic comedy, starring Jennifer Lopez, Alex O'Loughlin, Michaela Watkins, Eric Christian Olsen and Anthony Anderson

programme.title: Did You Hear about the Morgans
programme.desc: A bickering, separated couple on the brink of divorce are thrown back together when they witness a murder. The FBI arrange for them to go into hiding in a remote mountain town, a predicament that could either save their marriage or see them at each other's throats more than ever. Romantic comedy, starring Hugh Grant and Sarah Jessica Parker

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate risk-management consultant decides whether or not to destroy an artificially created humanoid. Sci-fi thriller, starring Kate Mara, Anya Taylor-Joy and Rose Leslie(n)

programme.title: (GMT) Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell(n)

programme.title: Miles
programme.desc: A teenage lad is desperate to move to Chicago and joins the volleyball team to get a scholarship. The problem is his high school only has a girls squad. Comedy drama, starring Missi Pyle, Stephen Root and Paul Reiser(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungles of India, but his carefree life is threatened by the return of a fierce tiger with a grudge against humans. The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba(n)

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's biopic of the technology entrepreneur, exploring his life through three pivotal moments over the course of 14 years. Jobs is passionately driven to revolutionise computing technology, but his dreams come at a price, with a devastating impact on both is relationship with his family and his own health. Starring Michael Fassbender, Kate Winslet and Seth Rogen(n)

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: Hardened fighters from all over the world, including military veterans and ruthless criminals, are abducted by aliens and transported to a dangerous jungle world. As they struggle to survive, they discover why they have been brought to the planet - to be used as prey in a big-game hunt. Sci-fi thriller sequel, with Adrien Brody, Topher Grace, Alice Braga, Danny Trejo and Laurence Fishburne(n)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former government operative Jason Bourne is drawn out of hiding to uncover more truths about his father, while CIA director Robert Dewey orders his head of cyber-security to hunt him down. Action thriller, starring Matt Damon, Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander and Julia Stiles(n)

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: An astronaut crash-lands on a strange planet and is captured and enslaved by the ruling race of highly intelligent apes. Luckily, he is helped by a sympathetic chimpanzee - but then discovers a shocking secret. Remake of the 1960s sci-fi adventure, directed by Tim Burton and starring Mark Wahlberg, Helena Bonham Carter and Tim Roth, and featuring a cameo appearance from the original film's star Charlton Heston(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungles of India, but his carefree life is threatened by the return of a fierce tiger with a grudge against humans. The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba(n)

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtis's romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson(n)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former government operative Jason Bourne is drawn out of hiding to uncover more truths about his father, while CIA director Robert Dewey orders his head of cyber-security to hunt him down. Action thriller, starring Matt Damon, Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander and Julia Stiles(n)

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: Hardened fighters from all over the world, including military veterans and ruthless criminals, are abducted by aliens and transported to a dangerous jungle world. As they struggle to survive, they discover why they have been brought to the planet - to be used as prey in a big-game hunt. Sci-fi thriller sequel, with Adrien Brody, Topher Grace, Alice Braga, Danny Trejo and Laurence Fishburne(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Wisecracking Detroit detective Axel Foley returns to Los Angeles to investigate the shooting of an old friend, and uncovers a connection with a spate of violent robberies carried out by a criminal who leaves a mysterious calling card. Comedy thriller sequel, with Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, John Ashton, Ronny Cox and Brigitte Nielsen

programme.title: Breaking the Bank
programme.desc: A family-run British bank attracts the attention of ruthless Japanese and American corporations determined to buy them out. The incompetent chairman faces a struggle to save the business as well as his own marriage. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer, Tamsin Greig, John Michael Higgins and Andrew Sachs

programme.title: Easy Come, Easy Go
programme.desc: A part-time frogman accidentally discovers a cargo of lost treasure in the hold of a sunken Spanish galleon, and sets out to retrieve it with the aid of a yoga expert. Musical adventure, starring Elvis Presley, Dodie Marshall and Elsa Lanchester

programme.title: Who's Harry Crumb
programme.desc: A bungling private eye sets out to rescue the abducted daughter of a millionaire. Unfortunately, the hapless sleuth is unaware his oily boss is behind the kidnapping and has only given him the task because he is sure to fail - while leaving himself free to make a move on the millionaire's wife. Comedy, starring John Candy, Jeffrey Jones, Annie Potts and Tim Thomerson

programme.title: Love Of My Life
programme.desc: A woman diagnosed with a fatal brain tumour accepts her fate without fuss, but then her first husband pitches up vowing to win her back. Romantic comedy, starring Anna Chancellor, John Hannah and Hermione Norris

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A Nascar racing champion has everything he could want - until an arrogant French rival seizes the title from him, and his wife runs off with his best friend. Forced to move back in with his mother, the downhearted driver turns to his estranged father for help rebuilding his shattered self-confidence. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, John C Reilly and Sacha Baron Cohen

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen

programme.title: Sausage Party
programme.desc: When he hears life after the supermarket isn't much fun for groceries, Frank the sausage investigates. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Seth Rogen and Kristen Wiig

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: When thugs steal Keanu the cat, two mild-mannered cousins pose as deadly assassins to get the beloved feline back. Action comedy, starring Jordan Peele, Keegan-Michael Key and Tiffany Haddish

programme.title: Starsky & Hutch
programme.desc: Two mismatched detectives are forced to work together for the first time to track down a crime kingpin who has introduced a new, undetectable narcotic to the streets - but they struggle to get along. Comedy spoofing the 1970s cop show, starring Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Snoop Dogg, Vince Vaughn and Juliette Lewis

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Teenager Marty McFly travels back to the 1950s in a time machine built by his eccentric inventor friend. The return journey proves tricky enough, but he also accidentally alters the sequence of events that led to his parents falling in love - and has to persuade his future dad to win his mother's heart, or he will never be born. Sci-fi comedy adventure, starring Michael J Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson and Crispin Glover

programme.title: Sausage Party
programme.desc: When he hears life after the supermarket isn't much fun for groceries, Frank the sausage investigates. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Seth Rogen and Kristen Wiig

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: When thugs steal Keanu the cat, two mild-mannered cousins pose as deadly assassins to get the beloved feline back. Action comedy, starring Jordan Peele, Keegan-Michael Key and Tiffany Haddish

programme.title: Mrs Brown's Boys D'Movie
programme.desc: The indomitable Irish matriarch discovers that a plan is afoot by developers to buy the famous Dublin street market where her family has run a fruit and veg stall for generations. Assembling a band of eccentric allies, she plans to fight back, only to realise her daughter is not interested in taking over the family business. Comedy, starring Brendan O'Carroll and Jennifer Gibney

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Maverick cop Axel Foley returns to Los Angeles when an investigation into a colleague's murder leads him to a Hollywood theme park. He enlists the help of old ally Rosewood to prove the resort is a cover for a major counterfeiting ring connected to a terrorist conspiracy. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Theresa Randle and Bronson Pinchot

programme.title: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
programme.desc: A would-be rock star flees his repressive Christian father in search of stardom, teaming up with a laid-back guitarist along the way. However, for the duo to become the rock gods they are surely destined to be, they must find a magical guitar pick that gives its owner unprecedented musical prowess - a quest that leads them to a confrontation with Satan himself. Comedy, starring Jack Black, Kyle Gass, Meat Loaf, Dave Grohl, Tim Robbins, Ben Stiller and John C Reilly

programme.title: Police Academy 7: Mission to Moscow
programme.desc: Commandant Lassard sends the incompetent cops to Russia to help their counterparts capture an elusive criminal mastermind who uses his genius with computers to pull off a series of daring robberies. Comedy sequel, starring George Gaynes, Michael Winslow, David Graf, Leslie Easterbrook and Christopher Lee

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen

programme.title: Barbershop: A Fresh Cut
programme.desc: As their surrounding community has taken a turn for the worse, the crew at Calvin's Barbershop come together to bring some much-needed change to their neighbourhood. Comedy, starring Ice Cube, Cedric the Entertainer and Regina Hall

programme.title: Little Man
programme.desc: A tiny baby-faced jewel thief tries to steal a priceless diamond for a gangster, only for it to end up in the home of a childless and gullible suburban couple. In a bid to get it back, the crook masquerades as an abandoned child to get himself adopted as their baby son - but comes to regret the ruse when he has to suffer nappy changes and being breastfed. Comedy, with Marlon and Shawn Wayans, Kerry Washington and Tracy Morgan

programme.title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
programme.desc: Israeli Special Agent Zohan Dvir grows tired of his dangerous life and longs for a change of scene. While in the process of capturing an enemy activist, Zohan fakes his own death and moves to New York to begin a new life as a hair stylist. He is forced to use his combat training once more to defend his neighbourhood from a crooked landlord and his thugs. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, John Turturro and Emmanuelle Chriqui

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: A food critic realises she is in love with her best friend just as he announces he is going to marry another woman. Determined to have him to herself, she heads for the wedding with the intention of sabotaging the ceremony - but persuading the groom to give up on his bride-to-be proves harder than expected. Romantic comedy, starring Julia Roberts, Dermot Mulroney, Cameron Diaz and Rupert Everett

programme.title: Runaway Bride
programme.desc: A disreputable journalist hopes to get his ailing career back on track by writing an article about a commitment-shy woman famed for ditching bridegrooms at the altar - but complications arise when the pair meet on the eve of her latest attempt at marriage. Romantic comedy, starring Julia Roberts and Richard Gere, with Joan Cusack, Hector Elizondo and Rita Wilson

programme.title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
programme.desc: Israeli Special Agent Zohan Dvir grows tired of his dangerous life and longs for a change of scene. While in the process of capturing an enemy activist, Zohan fakes his own death and moves to New York to begin a new life as a hair stylist. He is forced to use his combat training once more to defend his neighbourhood from a crooked landlord and his thugs. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, John Turturro and Emmanuelle Chriqui

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey

programme.title: Little Man
programme.desc: A tiny baby-faced jewel thief tries to steal a priceless diamond for a gangster, only for it to end up in the home of a childless and gullible suburban couple. In a bid to get it back, the crook masquerades as an abandoned child to get himself adopted as their baby son - but comes to regret the ruse when he has to suffer nappy changes and being breastfed. Comedy, with Marlon and Shawn Wayans, Kerry Washington and Tracy Morgan

programme.title: Road Trip
programme.desc: Four students hit the road, heading off on a foolhardy mission to retrieve an embarrassing video mistakenly sent to an unsuspecting girlfriend - but it is not long before things go wrong and they end up having several nasty scrapes. Comedy, starring Tom Green as the tale's narrator, with Breckin Meyer, Seann William Scott, Amy Smart, Paulo Costanzo and DJ Qualls(n)

programme.title: Bachelor Party
programme.desc: A bus driver's forthcoming wedding is jeopardised by his fiancee's hostile parents and a raunchy stag night organised by well-meaning friends. Comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Adrian Zmed, William Tepper and Tawny Kitaen(n)

programme.title: (GMT) Bruno (2009)
programme.desc: A gay Austrian fashion journalist becomes a figure of hate in his own country, and heads to America in search of celebrity with his adoring assistant in tow. He embarks on a campaign of publicity stunts to make himself famous, encountering prejudice and meeting people similarly desperate for stardom. Spoof documentary, starring Sacha Baron Cohen and Gustaf Hammarsten(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen(n)

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A by-the-book Los Angeles cop is paired with a laidback new partner to investigate the nefarious activities of a TV evangelist and a pornographic-magazine baron suspected of operating a criminal cult. Comedy spoof of the 1950s TV series, starring Dan Aykroyd, Tom Hanks, Christopher Plummer and the original show's star Harry Morgan(n)

programme.title: (GMT) Back to the Future Part III (1990)
programme.desc: Time-travelling teenager Marty McFly is transported back to the days of the Wild West, where he strives to save his eccentric scientist friend Doc Brown from death at the hands of a villainous gunslinger. Final instalment in the sci-fi comedy trilogy, starring Michael J Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Mary Steenburgen and Thomas F Wilson(n)

programme.title: Dirty 30
programme.desc: Four friends stuck in a rut decide to celebrate one of their birthdays in style, but it isn't long before things spiral out of control. Comedy, starring Grace Helbig, Mamrie Hart and Hannah Hart(n)

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: A teenager is surprised when she is befriended by the girls in the most popular clique at her new school. However, a dating mishap leads to trouble and her supposed friends start to turn on her. Urged on by other pals outside their circle, the newcomer resolves to bring down the self-appointed queen of campus - only to end up adopting some of her rival's crueller characteristics. Comedy, with Lindsay Lohan, Rachel McAdams, Tina Fey and Lacey Chabert(n)

programme.title: All About Steve
programme.desc: A single crossword compiler goes on a blind date with a news cameraman and is instantly smitten, but he is less keen. When her infatuation gets her fired from her job, she devotes herself to pursuing him across America, determined to convince him they are meant for each other. Romantic comedy, with Sandra Bullock, Bradley Cooper and Thomas Haden Church(n)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: After accidentally knocking Kate Moss into the Thames, hapless champagne-swigging friends Patsy and Edina are hounded by the paparazzi. Comedy based on the BBC sitcom, starring Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley and Julia Sawalha(n)

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: When it becomes obvious that his solo album is a flop, a former boy band member does everything he can to maintain his celebrity status. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg, Jorma Taccone and Akiva Schaffer(n)

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: Dim male model Derek Zoolander is stunned to find his career going downhill thanks to the arrival of an equally vacuous rival - but fails to realise he is merely a pawn in a dangerous game of international espionage and world domination. Comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Will Ferrell, Milla Jovovich, Christine Taylor and David Duchovny(n)

programme.title: Zoolander 2
programme.desc: A dim-witted supermodel must step back into the spotlight and save the day when someone starts murdering pop stars. Comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller and Owen Wilson(n)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: After accidentally knocking Kate Moss into the Thames, hapless champagne-swigging friends Patsy and Edina are hounded by the paparazzi. Comedy based on the BBC sitcom, starring Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley and Julia Sawalha(n)

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: When it becomes obvious that his solo album is a flop, a former boy band member does everything he can to maintain his celebrity status. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg, Jorma Taccone and Akiva Schaffer(n)

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: A teenage girl finds herself pregnant after a one-night stand with her best friend. Deciding to give her baby up for adoption, she thinks she has found the perfect parents in a yuppie couple. However, over the next nine months she begins to experience doubts about her plans. Comedy, starring Ellen Page, Michael Cera, Jennifer Garner and Jason Bateman(n)

programme.title: The 5th Wave
programme.desc: Earth suffers a series of four devastating attacks from alien invaders, that leaves civilisation in ruins. As the human race awaits the fifth and final onslaught that will wipe them out, a teenage girl tries to protect her younger brother in a dangerous wilderness - and gets drawn into a plan to fight back against the aliens. Sci-fi adventure based on Rick Yancey's novel, starring Chloe Grace Moretz and Liev Schreiber

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Lean's Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Peter Parker continues his fight for justice, but unrequited love and personal worries take their toll and he is tempted to abandon his web-slinging alter ego. However, the arrival of deadly new bad guy Doctor Octopus plunges him into a race against time to save New York. Comic-book adventure sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina, James Franco and Rosemary Harris

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: World heavyweight boxing champion Rocky Balboa settles down into a life of luxury - but a cloud appears on the horizon in the shape of ambitious contender Clubber Lang, whose brutal fighting style represents a serious threat to his title. Drama, starring Sylvester Stallone, Mr T, Burgess Meredith, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers and Hulk Hogan

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: An explorer stumbles upon evidence that an American Civil War battleship, which was laden with treasure when it sank without trace, has ended up somewhere in the Sahara. However, he is deflected from his mercenary quest to find the hoard by an encounter with a tenacious doctor, whose battle to stop the spread of a deadly disease could be linked to his own mission. Adventure, starring Matthew McConaughey, Penelope Cruz and Steve Zahn

programme.title: xXx: The Return Of Xander Cage
programme.desc: The extreme sports-loving super spy is brought out of exile to retrieve a powerful weapon known as Pandora's Box. Action thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Donnie Yen and Toni Collette

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former government operative Jason Bourne is drawn out of hiding to uncover more truths about his father, while CIA director Robert Dewey orders his head of cyber-security to hunt him down. Action thriller, starring Matt Damon, Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander and Julia Stiles

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Amnesiac rogue assassin Jason Bourne's long-buried memories are reawakened by a British journalist researching the secret organisation that was responsible for transforming him into a killing machine. Meanwhile, a ruthless CIA director becomes convinced Bourne is still a security risk, and plans to dispose of him once and for all. Third instalment of the spy thriller series, directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Matt Damon, Joan Allen, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Paddy Considine, Scott Glenn and Albert Finney

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Peter Parker continues his fight for justice, but unrequited love and personal worries take their toll and he is tempted to abandon his web-slinging alter ego. However, the arrival of deadly new bad guy Doctor Octopus plunges him into a race against time to save New York. Comic-book adventure sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina, James Franco and Rosemary Harris

programme.title: xXx: The Return Of Xander Cage
programme.desc: The extreme sports-loving super spy is brought out of exile to retrieve a powerful weapon known as Pandora's Box. Action thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Donnie Yen and Toni Collette

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former government operative Jason Bourne is drawn out of hiding to uncover more truths about his father, while CIA director Robert Dewey orders his head of cyber-security to hunt him down. Action thriller, starring Matt Damon, Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander and Julia Stiles

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum

Third instalment of the spy thriller series, directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Matt Damon, Joan Allen, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Paddy Considine, Scott Glenn and Albert Finney

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: The daughter of a respected actor becomes bored with her high society lifestyle and trains to become a bounty hunter. However, the thrills of her new occupation, coupled with the presence of television cameras recording her exploits for a reality TV show, soon send her life spiralling out of control. Thriller, starring Keira Knightley, Mickey Rourke and Jacqueline Bisset

programme.title: Stone of Destiny
programme.desc: Four students in 1950s Glasgow hatch a plan to inspire a little national pride by breaking into Westminster Abbey and stealing the Stone of Scone, an important Scottish historical relic that has been held on English soil since the Middle Ages, and returning it to its own country. Fact-based comedy, starring Charlie Cox, Kate Mara, Billy Boyd and Robert Carlyle

programme.title: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi
programme.desc: A US embassy in Libya comes under attack from extremists, who kill the ambassador. With no help in sight, a small band of CIA security operatives from various military backgrounds takes a stand to fight off the attackers and protect the remaining diplomatic personnel. Fact-based action thriller, starring John Krasinski and James Badge Dale

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: The Italian Stallion agrees to help former champion Apollo Creed train for a match against a seemingly invincible boxer from the Soviet Union, only to see his friend die as a result of injuries sustained in the fight. Rocky vows to avenge him, and prepares to take on the Russian heavyweight in his own country. Drama sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Dolph Lundgren, Talia Shire, Carl Weathers and Brigitte Nielsen

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Wizarding Brit Newt Scamander arrives in 1920s New York with a bagful of magical creatures that proceed to cause chaos. Harry Potter prequel, starring Eddie Redmayne, Katherine Waterston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: A ragtag team of gifted villains, including Deadshot, Harley Quinn and Killer Croc, are strong-armed into doing good by a no-nonsense government agent. Fantasy adventure, starring Will Smith, Margot Robbie and Jared Leto

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freya's army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravenna's wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Wizarding Brit Newt Scamander arrives in 1920s New York with a bagful of magical creatures that proceed to cause chaos. Harry Potter prequel, starring Eddie Redmayne, Katherine Waterston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: A ragtag team of gifted villains, including Deadshot, Harley Quinn and Killer Croc, are strong-armed into doing good by a no-nonsense government agent. Fantasy adventure, starring Will Smith, Margot Robbie and Jared Leto

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically engineered assassin, who exists at the beck and call of a mysterious organisation, fails in his latest mission, and becomes a target himself, as security forces worldwide become aware of his existence and a rival agent is assigned to tie up loose ends. Action thriller, starring Timothy Olyphant, Dougray Scott and Olga Kurylenko

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: A whaling ship sets sail from New England in 1820, only to come under attack from a gigantic whale that seems to want revenge on them. In the aftermath of the attack, the surviving members of the crew face further physical and moral challenges as they try to stay alive on the open sea. Fact-based historical adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Cillian Murphy and Ben Whishaw

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: A renegade general and his crack team of mercenaries take over the abandoned fortress prison of Alcatraz and threaten San Francisco with toxic nerve-gas rockets to extort a massive ransom. To break their stranglehold on the city, the FBI sends in a chemical weapons expert and a jailed SAS veteran, chosen because he is the only man to have ever escaped from the infamous penitentiary. Action thriller, with Sean Connery, Nicolas Cage and Ed Harris(n)

programme.title: (GMT) Battle of the Bulge (1965)
programme.desc: A German tank commander is assigned to lead a surprise counter-attack against Allied forces as part of a last-ditch attempt to turn the tide of the Second World War and prevent the invasion of his country. An American intelligence officer realises what the enemy is planning, and tries to convince his superiors that they are facing a major offensive. Drama, starring Robert Shaw, Henry Fonda, Dana Andrews, Telly Savalas and Charles Bronson(n)

programme.title: (GMT) Rocky V (1990)
programme.desc: The heavyweight champion is forced into retirement due to brain damage inflicted in the ring, and finds his fortune has been lost on the stock market by his accountant. Returning to his working-class roots, he trains an up-and-coming fighter, only to see his protege turn against him. Drama sequel, starring Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire and real-life boxer Tommy Morrison(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A stormtrooper fighting for an evil regime turns against his masters. He joins forces with a desert scavenger, and together they are drawn into the search for legendary war hero Luke Skywalker, who disappeared years previously. Meanwhile, a terrible weapon is about to be unleashed, that will allow the forces of evil to dominate the galaxy once again. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Harrison Ford and Adam Driver(n)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: After the re-emergence of the world's first mutant world-destroyer Apocalypse, the X-Men must unite to defeat his extinction level plan. Sci-fi adventure, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence(n)

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A fishing boat crew plucks a man out of the sea with two bullet wounds in his back and a safe-deposit number sewn into his skin - but absolutely no memory of who he is or how he got there. In the search for his true identity, he is pursued by assassins - but his skill at evading them suggests his own past is far from straightforward. Thriller, starring Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen and Brian Cox(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A stormtrooper fighting for an evil regime turns against his masters. He joins forces with a desert scavenger, and together they are drawn into the search for legendary war hero Luke Skywalker, who disappeared years previously. Meanwhile, a terrible weapon is about to be unleashed, that will allow the forces of evil to dominate the galaxy once again. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Harrison Ford and Adam Driver(n)

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams(n)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: After the re-emergence of the world's first mutant world-destroyer Apocalypse, the X-Men must unite to defeat his extinction level plan. Sci-fi adventure, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence(n)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The American president is forced to take drastic measures to save his family when their plane is hijacked by Russian terrorists demanding the release of a jailed radical general. Meanwhile, the vice president tries to manage the crisis from Washington and has to decide whether to shoot the aircraft down. Action thriller, starring Harrison Ford, Gary Oldman, Glenn Close, Dean Stockwell and William H Macy(n)

programme.title: Kronk's New Groove
programme.desc: Inca entrepreneur Kronk is keen to see his restaurant business get off to a good start, especially with his father about to visit. However, the catering industry proves to be more challenging than he ever expected. Animated sequel to Disney's comedy The Emperor's New Groove, with the voices of David Spade, Tracey Ullman, Patrick Warburton, Eartha Kitt and John Goodman

programme.title: Little Mermaid: Ariel's Beginning
programme.desc: The underwater princess is devastated when her mother is captured by pirates, but with the aid of her sea creature friends, sets off on a rescue mission. She also has to convince her father to renounce his decision to ban singing in his kingdom. Animated prequel, with the voice of Jodi Benson, Sally Field and Lorelei Hill Butters

programme.title: Piglet's Big Movie
programme.desc: The plucky porker is upset when his friends tell him he is too small to come honey-harvesting with them, so he embarks on an adventure of his own - and it is not long before his pals start to miss him and realise just how important he is. Animation, featuring the voices of John Fiedler, Jim Cummings and Andre Stojka

programme.title: Frankenweenie
programme.desc: A lonely boy uses electricity to bring his dead dog back to life. However, the presence of the animal in the neighbourhood leads to panic over a monster, while the young scientist's classmates are soon also meddling with life and death to revive their own pets. Tim Burton's stop-motion animated fantasy, with the voices of Charlie Tahan and Winona Ryder

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: A video game villain grows tired of always being the bad guy, and ventures into other games in search of the chance to be a hero, unwittingly causing chaos in the process. When a deadly threat to the entire arcade appears, it falls to him to set things right. Animated adventure, with the voices of John C Reilly, Sarah Silverman and Jane Lynch

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Wicked fashion designer Cruella De Vil steals a huge litter of newborn Dalmatian puppies to turn into a magnificent coat - but the lucky pups have many four-legged friends who are determined the evil woman and her cronies will get their just deserts. Disney's live-action remake of the animated comedy adventure, starring Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson, Hugh Laurie and Mark Williams

programme.title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
programme.desc: A map-maker dreams of locating the lost continent of Atlantis - and gets his chance when an eccentric billionaire invites him to join a team of intrepid explorers. Animated adventure, with the voices of Michael J Fox, James Garner, Jim Varney and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Frankenweenie

However, the presence of the animal in the neighbourhood leads to panic over a monster, while the young scientist's classmates are soon also meddling with life and death to revive their own pets. Tim Burton's stop-motion animated fantasy, with the voices of Charlie Tahan and Winona Ryder

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the asteroid impact that wiped out the dinosaurs never happened, humans have evolved as a primitive species while the giant lizards remain the dominant life form on Earth. A young apatosaurus becomes separated from his family, but finds a friend in a feral human boy as he makes the dangerous journey home. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Raymond Ochoa and Jack Bright

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: A video game villain grows tired of always being the bad guy, and ventures into other games in search of the chance to be a hero, unwittingly causing chaos in the process. When a deadly threat to the entire arcade appears, it falls to him to set things right. Animated adventure, with the voices of John C Reilly, Sarah Silverman and Jane Lynch

Disney's live-action remake of the animated comedy adventure, starring Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson, Hugh Laurie and Mark Williams

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
programme.desc: Wily rogue Captain Jack Sparrow finds an old debt coming back to haunt him. Years before, he sold his soul to the legendary Davy Jones, who has now risen from the depths of the ocean to collect what he is owed - with a giant sea monster at his command. Meanwhile, ruthless trader Lord Beckett is intent on seizing control of the Caribbean, and sets out to turn Jack and his allies against one another. Swashbuckling adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Jack Davenport and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
programme.desc: A map-maker dreams of locating the lost continent of Atlantis - and gets his chance when an eccentric billionaire invites him to join a team of intrepid explorers. Animated adventure, with the voices of Michael J Fox, James Garner, Jim Varney and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: A mother and her rebellious teenage daughter's simultaneous wishes to trade places results in them magically switching bodies for a day and gaining an unforgettable insight into each other's lives. Disney fantasy comedy, with Jodie Foster, Barbara Harris, Patsy Kelly, John Astin, Charlene Tilton and Sorrell Booke

programme.title: The Love Bug
programme.desc: Herbie, an irrepressible Beetle car with a mind of its own, takes a shine to a struggling racing driver and leads him to victory on the track. However, his success attracts the attention of an unscrupulous rival competitor, who will go to any lengths to win the most important race of all. Disney comedy, starring Dean Jones, Michele Lee, Buddy Hackett and David Tomlinson

programme.title: Disney's Blank Cheque
programme.desc: Convicted bank-robber Carl Quigley plots to exchange $1,000,000 in stolen bills by coercing a bank's president into swapping the notes for legal tender. As he tries to escape the scene of his plot, Quigley runs over 11-year-old Preston Waters' bicycle, and in his haste to get away, offers the boy a blank cheque as compensation. However, Quigley fails to anticipate tech-savvy Preston exploiting the gesture to help himself to the criminal's million-dollar fortune, then embarking a dream spending spree. Family comedy, starring Brian Bonsall and Miguel Ferrer

programme.title: Prom
programme.desc: High-school students eagerly look forward to their graduation party, but have personal and romantic issues to deal with along the way. The class president is determined everything needs to be perfect and is frustrated by a fellow student's interference - only to have a change of heart and realise he may be her perfect date. Comedy drama, with Aimee Teegarden and Thomas McDonell

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the asteroid impact that wiped out the dinosaurs never happened, humans have evolved as a primitive species while the giant lizards remain the dominant life form on Earth. A young apatosaurus becomes separated from his family, but finds a friend in a feral human boy as he makes the dangerous journey home. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Raymond Ochoa and Jack Bright

programme.title: The Aristocats
programme.desc: A jealous butler is outraged when his employer leaves a vast fortune to her cat and kittens instead of to him, so he drives the pets to the French countryside and dumps them. However, a streetwise alley cat steps in to help the pampered felines find their way home and claim their rightful inheritance. Animated Disney adventure, with the voices of Eva Gabor, Phil Harris and Scatman Crothers

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: A girl poses as a man so she can take her ailing father's place in the army and join in the battle against invading forces - a move that ensures her fame as a national hero. Disney animated adventure based on a Chinese folk tale, featuring the voices of Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, BD Wong and Miguel Ferrer

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: With the help of a magical dragon, a lonely orphan boy escapes from a life of servitude with the cruel Gogan family. He makes a fresh start in a seaside town, befriending a lighthouse keeper and her father, but the Gogans are soon on his trail, while a phoney doctor wants the dragon for his travelling show. Part-animated musical fantasy, starring Jim Dale, Sean Marshall, Helen Reddy, Mickey Rooney and Shelley Winters

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp

Family comedy, starring Brian Bonsall and Miguel Ferrer

programme.title: Return to Oz
programme.desc: Dorothy is whisked back to Oz in a storm and discovers the evil Nome King has taken over the magical land and turned her old friends to stone. Teaming up with some strange new companions, she sets out to banish him and his monstrous comrades. Fantasy adventure, based on the novels by L Frank Baum, starring Fairuza Balk, Jean Marsh, Nicol Williamson and Piper Laurie

programme.title: Prom
programme.desc: High-school students eagerly look forward to their graduation party, but have personal and romantic issues to deal with along the way. The class president is determined everything needs to be perfect and is frustrated by a fellow student's interference - only to have a change of heart and realise he may be her perfect date. Comedy drama, with Aimee Teegarden and Thomas McDonell(n)

programme.title: (GMT) The Santa Clause 3: The Escape Clause (2006)
programme.desc: Father Christmas's festive preparations are disrupted when mischievous Jack Frost turns up at the North Pole on a secret mission to sabotage the toy factory. To add to Santa's woes, the parents of the pregnant Mrs Claus come to stay. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Tim Allen, Martin Short, Elizabeth Mitchell and Alan Arkin(n)

programme.title: The News Boys

When media mogul Joseph Pulitzer raises his prices, threatening the livelihoods of the youngsters, they organise into a union to force him to put people's lives ahead of his own profits. Fact-based musical, starring Robert Duvall, Christian Bale and Ann-Margret(n)

programme.desc: A lonely boy uses electricity to bring his dead dog back to life. However, the presence of the animal in the neighbourhood leads to panic over a monster, while the young scientist's classmates are soon also meddling with life and death to revive their own pets. Tim Burton's stop-motion animated fantasy, with the voices of Charlie Tahan and Winona Ryder(n)

programme.title: Piper

Disney's live-action remake of the animated comedy adventure, starring Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson, Hugh Laurie and Mark Williams(n)

Disney comedy, with Rick Moranis, Marcia Strassman and Amy O'Neill(n)

programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley(n)

programme.desc: The swashbuckling rogues join forces with old foe Barbossa to take on villainous Lord Beckett. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley and Chow Yun-Fat, and featuring a cameo appearance by Keith Richards(n)

Animated comedy, with the voices of Jeff Bridges and Shia LaBeouf

Thriller, starring Michael Douglas, Glenn Close and Anne Archer

programme.desc: An FBI agent is assigned to protect a witness in the trial of a feared crime boss. However, when they board their flight from Hawaii to Los Angeles, the gangster's henchmen set in motion their plan to smuggle onto the aircraft and then release 450 poisonous snakes. Thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson, Julianna Margulies and Jonathan Phillips

programme.title: Blood Orange
programme.desc: Ageing rock star Bill receives a visit from Lucas, the ex-lover of his younger wife Isabelle, who demands she give him an inheritance he claims she has denied him. Bill invites Lucas to stay, hoping to make peace between them, but Lucas has a plan to get revenge, and manipulates the pool boy into helping him. Thriller, starring Iggy Pop and Kacey Clarke

programme.title: Every Secret Thing
programme.desc: When a young child goes missing, suspicion falls on two teenagers previously convicted for killing a baby. Thriller, starring Elizabeth Banks, Diane Lane and Dakota Fanning

programme.title: Die Hard 4.0
programme.desc: Tough New York cop John McClane is sent to escort a computer hacker to Washington for questioning. During this routine operation he stumbles on a criminal mastermind's plan to launch a technological terrorist attack on the US, and is forced to enlist the hacker's aid in foiling the evil scheme. Action thriller sequel, with Bruce Willis, Timothy Olyphant, Justin Long and Maggie Q

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: A single mother is determined to keep her daughter safe from harm when burglars break into their home. The pair hide out in a specially constructed sealed room, but the shelter becomes a prison when the robbers refuse to leave empty-handed. Thriller directed by David Fincher, starring Jodie Foster, Kristen Stewart, Forest Whitaker, Jared Leto and Dwight Yoakam

programme.title: Locked In
programme.desc: Sandra, a former pop star who put her career on hold to have a baby, suspects her producer-husband is now having an affair with a younger rising starlet. Determined to catch him out, she decides to surprise him by driving to Los Angeles with her young son in her new Monolith, a `super-car' with advanced security features. However, a series of unfortunate events leaves Sandra locked out of the car in the middle of the desert, while her son is trapped inside, and in mortal peril. Thriller, starring Katrina Bowden

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac

Thriller prequel adapted from the first of Thomas Harris's Lecter novels, starring Anthony Hopkins, Edward Norton, Ralph Fiennes and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.desc: When his brother falls foul of a ruthless mobster, a straight-laced man calls on his old friend and cop to help out. Crime thriller, starring Adrian Grenier, John Cusack and Nicolas Cage

programme.desc: Suspended cop Michael Clarke is tasked with infiltrating an infamous London gang and bringing down its leader. British crime drama, starring Kris Johnson and Patrick Connolly

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner

programme.title: Exposed
programme.desc: A detective is determined to bring his dead partner's killers to justice, despite warnings from both his superior officers and the murdered man's wife to forget about it. As he delves deeper, he uncovers dangerous secrets and evidence of political corruption, with a devoutly religious woman seemingly the key to the mystery. Crime thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Ana de Armas and Mira Sorvino

programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: Medical student Nancy Adams' plan to honour her late mother puts her face to face with a massive, man-eating shark. Survival horror, starring Blake Lively and Oscar Jaenada

programme.title: Imperium
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent infiltrates a white supremacist movement to prevent their planned terrorist attack. Crime thriller, starring Daniel Radcliffe and Toni Collette

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin
programme.desc: An inner-city drug dealer puts his life of crime behind him after a near-fatal shooting to pursue a new career as a rap artist. Unfortunately, when he performs songs inspired by his shady past, his former criminal associates do not take kindly to having their misdeeds immortalised in music. Drama, starring Curtis `50 Cent' Jackson, Terrence Howard and Ashley Walters

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: When their adoptive mother is killed in a robbery, her four sons reunite and swear vengeance on the murderers. But the background to her apparently random death turns out to be more complex than it first appeared, as the trail leads to corrupt cops and a notorious local gang boss. Thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Tyrese Gibson, Andre Benjamin, Garrett Hedlund, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Terrence Howard

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: A charming bank robber breaks out of jail and takes a female US Marshal hostage. Managing to escape, she sets out to track him down as he prepares for one last job - but as the chase intensifies, so do their feelings for each other. Steven Soderbergh's romantic crime drama, based on Elmore Leonard's novel, with George Clooney, Jennifer Lopez, Ving Rhames and Don Cheadle

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle

programme.desc: Medical student Nancy Adams' plan to honour her late mother puts her face to face with a massive, man-eating shark. Survival horror, starring Blake Lively and Oscar Jaenada

However, what the kidnappers do not realise is that the girl's father is a former CIA agent, who employs all his old skills as he searches for the criminals and tries to rescue his daughter. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Famke Janssen and Maggie Grace

programme.desc: Terrorists seize control of an ice-hockey stadium in the middle of a match attended by the US vice president. Taking the politician hostage, they threaten to blow up the building at the final whistle - but a resourceful former fireman takes it upon himself to thwart their dastardly plot. Action thriller, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Powers Boothe, Raymond J Barry and Whittni Wright

programme.desc: When accountant Jonathan Mardukas skips bail after having been arrested for embezzlement, bounty hunter Jack Walsh is hired to catch the fraudster and return him from New York to Los Angeles. Comedy thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Charles Grodin, Yaphet Kotto, Dennis Farina, John Ashton and Joe Pantoliano(n)

Comic-strip adventure, directed by and starring Warren Beatty, with Madonna, Al Pacino and Dustin Hoffman(n)

He quickly realises the only way to save his own life is to expose the truths his pursuers seem so intent on covering up, and seeks out a former intelligence agent to take them on at their own game. Thriller, starring Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight and Lisa Bonet(n)
